SELECT csl.id id, cslg.id gatewayId, ch.area apartmentName, '1' type, cau.username authUserName, CONCAT(ch.address,ch.area ,ch.building_num+ch.unit_num+ch.floor_num ,ch.house_num) houseAddress, cr.`name` roomNo, crc.customer_name customerName, crc.customer_phone customerPhone, csl.serial_num serialNum, csl.`status` status, csl.remaining_battery remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT(csl.install_time,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') installTime, cslg.gateway gateway, nsp.`name` providerName FROM caspain_test.smart_lock csl LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_provider nsp ON nsp.smart_provider_ID = csl.smart_provider_ID LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr ON csl.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg ON cslg.id = csl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cr.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room_contract crc ON crc.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON crc.created_by_id = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( csl.is_delete != '1' OR csl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cr.is_delete != '1' OR cr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( crc.is_delete != '1' OR crc.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cslg.is_delete != '1' OR cslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND crc.`status` = 'active'
AND csl.serial_num = '${serialNum}'
AND cr.name LIKE '%${roomNo}%'
AND crc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND crc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND ch.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND ch.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND ch.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND csl.status LIKE '%${status}%'

SELECT vsl.id id, vslg.id gatewayId, va.`name` apartmentName, '0' type, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, vsl.serial_num serialNum, vsl.`status` status, vsl.remaining_battery remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT(vsl.install_time,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') installTime, vslg.gateway gateway, nsp.`name` providerName FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock vsl LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_provider nsp ON nsp.smart_provider_ID = vsl.smart_provider_ID LEFT JOIN volga_test.smart_lock_gateway vslg ON vslg.id = vsl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr ON vsl.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vr.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract vrc ON vrc.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON vrc.created_by = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vsl.is_delete != '1' OR vsl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vr.is_delete != '1' OR vr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vrc.is_delete != '1' OR vrc.is_delete IS NULL ) and vrc.`status`='active'
AND vsl.serial_num = '${serialNum}'
AND vr.name LIKE '%${roomNo}%'
AND vrc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND vrc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND vsl.status LIKE '%${status}%'

SELECT ch.address houseAddress, cr.`name` roomNo, csl.serial_num serialNum, csl.`status` , csl.remaining_battery remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT( csl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, csl.remark remark, cslg.gateway gateway, nsp.`name` providerName FROM caspain_test.smart_lock csl LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_provider nsp ON nsp.smart_provider_ID = csl.smart_provider_ID LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr ON csl.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cr.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg ON cslg.id = csl.gateway_id WHERE csl.id=#{id}

SELECT va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vsl.serial_num serialNum, vsl.`status` status, vsl.remaining_battery remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT( vsl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, vsl.remark remark, vslg.gateway gateway, nsp.`name` providerName FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock vsl LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_provider nsp ON nsp.smart_provider_ID = vsl.smart_provider_ID LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr ON vsl.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vr.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN volga_test.smart_lock_gateway vslg ON vslg.id = vsl.gateway_id WHERE vsl.id=#{id}

SELECT slp.id id, slp.pwd_no pwdNo, sl.serial_num serial_num, DATE_FORMAT( slp.enable_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) enable_time, DATE_FORMAT( slp.disable_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) disable_time, slp.digit_pwd_type, slp.`status`, CASE WHEN slp.password_type = 0 THEN '密码' ELSE '门卡' END password_type, slp.user_name, slp.mobile, slp.`password`, slp.remark FROM caspain_test.`smart_lock_password` slp, caspain_test.smart_lock sl WHERE slp.lock_id = sl.id AND ( slp.is_delete != '1' OR slp.is_delete IS NULL ) AND sl.id = #{id}
